comment.author: 25512944@N06
comment._content: Looking towards Wollongong Harbour form the approximate site of the North Wollongong Beach dressing sheds.

comment.author: 14358961@N00
comment._content: it is here at the south end of north wollongong beach maps.google.com/maps?f=q&hl=en&geocode=&q=wol...

comment.author: 47572660@N08
comment._content: That railway cutting is still there, of course, but is now a footpath/ cycleway. The grassy area on the hill on the right is what became known as Smith's Hill Fort, see: www.illawarramuseum.com/a_SmithsHillFort_Print.htm A wonderful, historic photo. Thanks, PowerHouse!

comment.author: 47572660@N08
comment._content: P.S. I forgot to mention that the original Wollongong lighthouse is in the background, probably in its original condition.
